titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3030) to provide credit assistance to farmers, to strengthen the Farm Credit System, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-307.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 304 - 56 (Record Vote No: 322).

bill.summary: 9/17/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3030 (agricultural credit).
